<JD_START>
Job Title: Multi Unit Director of Operations

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
To Apply for this Job Click Here

An internationally acclaimed Multi-Platform company recognized for its excellence in delivering the finest services to our Partners and their guests is seeking a Multi Unit Director of Operations. This position will oversee and manage a group of premium locations in our client's portfolio. We seek the highest caliber Executives who embody the most exemplary leadership skills to move our business forward. Our leaders are innovative, talent-driven, and manage offerings to clients by creating partnerships that result in a rewarding experience. In addition, our leaders have a vision for the future and develop strategies that provide direct support to other leaders and teams while embodying our core values and the Spirit of Progress.

Director Of Operations Qualifications

Minimum of 4 years of multi-unit experience in a high volume full-service corporate restaurantsMust have client facing experience, prefer contract servicesA leader of others that can grow and develop teams and individualsAbility to budget, forecast, and adjust to meet and exceed financial objectivesA desire to always be improving your market and bringing your people to the next levelExperience with union workplace a plus

Director Of Operations Compensation

Extremely competitive base salaryAttainable bonus structureFull benefits package401K with company matchPaid vacation and PTO

At Goodwin Recruiting we are committed to our core values. We take our value, Dedicated to Diversity & Inclusion, very seriously and will never discriminate against a candidate or client based on any protected classes. Our clients seek qualified candidates, and that is what we deliver. A person's age, gender, race, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status, or arrest or conviction record has no bearing on whether he, she, or they are able to do the job. We evaluate the knowledge, skills, and abilities that meet the requirements of the position and aim to open doors and change lives. We value all people, understanding that uniqueness and diversity foster a stronger team that is innovative and brings varying perspectives to the table. We put our money where our mouth is and are proud of our efforts to identify a broad slate of candidates, with many hiring success stories to share. JOB ID: 134900 #post

Ryan Skinner

To Apply for this Job Click Here

, $140,000 - $160,000,

Experience Level (if available): Director
<JD_END>
